name: Midsummer Flight (VR)
description:
Midsummer Flight

Use hand movements and gestures to control your insectoid companion and make it cut water capsules that float down from the trees!

Controls

Steering - hold the trigger button on any hand to steer your companion through the air.

Gestures - hold the grip button on any hand to activate gesture recognition for that hand. Currently implemented are: both hands up to let your companion fly up, both hands down or towards you to recall.

Homing - press the upper button to command your companion to search capsules in a certain range and automatically target them.

Recall - press the lower button to call your companion back to its starting position.

A night mode is available via the menu.
